title: What are some title ideas for a poetry book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good question. I got an idea from a poet who called my stuff, stacks of paragraphs. I’ve written and put into book form (as yet unpublished) My Book of Stacks? Yes CJ, someday. That was a comment to my bestus poet friend. Here are the first two entries of my unpublished book. Apologize for the appearance. Copy and paste didn’t work well. Stacks of Paragraphs A poet once called my stuff Stacks of Paragraphs. Maybe they didn’t think it was poetry. Having given the Stack of Paragraphs reference further thought I took myself down that age old discussion of what is poetry. Paragraphs and line breaks a poem do not make. We are in that age of poetry without definition. It seems if one wishes, all things written are poetry. But that is no more true than a front and back cover making a book. Do rhyming lines make a poem? Paragraphs? Line breaks? Genius? Peter Roget nyms? Clichéd phrases? I honest to God don’t know how far to stretch the definition of ‘poem’ and I’m sure no two definitions are the same because the Pleasure Of Everyone’s Mind is different. No matter, writers should write and let the reader sort it out. I like stacks of Shel, The Dr. and Bukowski. How about you? This is a book of my Stacks. Call it what you will. be-u-ti-ful dandys (for my little Mo) My stacks idled like bright yellow dandys among velvet bluegrass spoiling conformed scapes,  wilting under pesti-comments dedicated to purifying the field.  Then I remember the bonding walks with my granddaughter, her squeals of delight, picking those be-u-ti-ful yellow flowers, ignoring the green.  I wrote another just for her.

Here is an idea: Science fiction Epic Poetry. Kosmoautikon An epic poem describing the future space travels of American escaping a destroyed Earth. The creation of a new race, called Homo-Faustus 300 girls are taken from Russian orphanages to breed this new race in space. Europa is terraformed as a place to plant new life. A new discovery is made of the operation of the cosmos. We live in an electronic stream. Gravity is not a force at all….compared to the electric charge of the cosmos. The sun is heated from the outside of its surface…heated by an electronic plasma current…not form within. The Sun is an electronic capacitor…not a nuclear reactor. But the most important quality of the poem..and it has to be….. Memorable speech is used for the first time in over 100 years in Ameican literature. But you have to read all 10 books to get the significance of the achievement. Click on favorites here….Kosmoautikon.com
